articles.title: OpenClaw - AI Agent Security Vulnerability
articles.summary: OpenClaw, a popular open-source AI agent originally developed by Austrian solo developer Peter Steinberger, is facing a serious security reckoning. The tool can run a personal AI assistant locally and manage emails and control smart home devices. This highlights security concerns with autonomous AI agents.

articles.title: Beehive - Multi-Workspace Agent Orchestrator
articles.summary: A multi-workspace agent orchestrator for managing AI agents across different environments. Enables coordination of multiple AI agents in separate workspaces.

articles.title: Mission Control - Open-source Task Management for AI Agents
articles.summary: An open-source task management system specifically designed for AI agents. Helps coordinate and manage AI agent workflows and tasks.

articles.title: Duck Talk - Real-time Voice Interface for Claude Code
articles.summary: A real-time voice interface that allows users to talk to their Claude Code assistant. Enables voice-based interaction with Claude AI.

articles.title: Mini Claude Code Clone in Rust
articles.summary: A minimal Claude Code clone written in Rust, demonstrating the possibility of creating lightweight AI assistant implementations.

articles.title: AI-powered Ouija Board with Fine-tuned 3B Model
articles.summary: A local AI-powered Ouija board built with a fine-tuned 3B model, demonstrating creative local AI applications.

articles.title: February 2026 AI Model Releases: Claude, DeepSeek, Gemini, Grok, GPT-5.3
articles.summary: Multiple frontier AI models released in February 2026 including Claude Sonnet 5 (coding and reasoning focus), DeepSeek V4, Gemini 3, Grok updates, and GPT-5.3. A significant month for AI model releases.

articles.title: Gemini 3.1 Pro Takes Top Spot on Multiple Benchmarks
articles.summary: Google's Gemini 3.1 Pro was released on February 19, 2026 and immediately claimed top spots on multiple developer-focused benchmarks including ARC-AGI-2, GPQA Diamond, BrowseComp, and LiveCodeBench Pro.

articles.title: Claude Opus 4.6: SOTA in Agentic Coding and 1M Context
articles.summary: Anthropic released Claude Opus 4.6 with 1M token context and agent teams capabilities. Represents major advancement in agentic coding and long context handling.

articles.title: Gemini Agents Getting First Agentic Capabilities
articles.summary: Google Gemini is getting its first agentic capabilities, marking a shift from passive chatbots to autonomous agents that can anticipate, plan, and execute tasks.

articles.title: Shopify Coinbase CEOs Show Off Code Commit Charts As AI Makes Coding Easier
articles.summary: Shopify and Coinbase CEOs are showcasing their GitHub contribution graphs again, thanks to AI-powered coding agents like Anthropic's Claude Code and OpenAI's Codex enabling executives to re-engage in software development.

articles.title: AI Score Tool - Detect AI Generated Code
articles.summary: A tool that scans codebases to estimate what percentage was likely written by AI, using pattern analysis, comment-to-code ratios, naming consistency, and heuristic analysis.

articles.title: GitHub Open Source Weekly 2026-02-25
articles.summary: This week's GitHub trending highlights: Skills ecosystem solidifies, embedded AI rises, and OpenClaw offspring sweep prediction markets. Major focus on AI agents and prompt engineering.

articles.title: Strands Labs - Experimental Agentic AI Development
articles.summary: AWS introduces Strands Labs, a new GitHub organization for experimental agentic AI development. The Strands Agents SDK has been downloaded 14 million times since its open source release.

articles.title: Anthropic Education Report: The AI Fluency Index
articles.summary: Anthropic's research on AI fluency finds that 85.7% of conversations exhibit iteration and refinement. Most common expression is augmentative, treating AI as a thought partner.

articles.title: AI Coding Agent Tracker - Public Commit Log
articles.summary: A public auditable log tracking AI coding agent commit counts on public GitHub repos over 10-day rolling average. Shows percentage of commits by AI agents.

articles.title: GitHub Trending Daily 2026-02-24 - AI Agents & Prompt Engineering
articles.summary: Top themes: AI Agents & Prompt Engineering (x1hlol/system-prompts-and-models-of-ai-tools), RAG & Knowledge Graphs (VectifyAI/PageIndex), AI Infrastructure (cloudflare/agents, NevaMind-AI/memU).

articles.title: HuggingFace Spaces - Trending AI Apps
articles.summary: HuggingFace Spaces features trending AI applications including Dia 1.6B for dialogue generation, DeepAI tools, MTEB Leaderboard, and Open LLM Leaderboard.

articles.title: Product Hunt AI Tools 2026
articles.summary: Trending AI tools on Product Hunt include Claude by Anthropic, ChatGPT, various AI infrastructure tools, and generative AI applications.

articles.title: AI Tools for African Founders
articles.summary: Five AI tools helping African founders build businesses despite local constraints, enabling tiny teams to compete with global startups. Tools include GitHub Copilot, SurferSEO, Zendesk AI.

digest.summary: Captured 20 AI items. Preference focus is new models and new technical architecture: 9 high-priority, 8 medium-priority, 3 low-priority. 0 business-heavy items were deprioritized.
